title: Humanitarian programme: managing programmes & projects - Bioforce
content:
:**

**humanitarian programme: managing programmes & projects**

- **duration:** 12 days
- **location:** lyon
- **learning mode:** mixed (face-to-face and at a distance)

**target audience:**
- recent graduates
- humanitarian workers
- career changers

**course objectives:**
- equip candidates with skills for humanitarian aid and project management.

**accreditation:**
- accreditation of prior learning options available.

**course categories:**
- project management
- human resources & management
- finance
- logistics
- security
- humanitarian issues and contexts

**languages offered:**
- arabic
- french
- english

**age requirements:**
- accessible from 18 years old.

**start dates:**
- specific dates available upon inquiry.

c) **removed content:**
- promotional text, technical jargon, and unrelated news items have been eliminated to focus solely on the training information relevant to candidates.
